document.full_text: a roadside bomb killed four service members from the nato-led international security assistance force (isaf) in afghanistan's volatile east on monday, the coalition said in a statement, one of the worst attacks on foreign troops in recent weeks.
document.title: roadside bomb kills 4 nato soldiers in afghan east
lines_and_colors: a roadside bomb killed four service members from the nato-led international security assistance force (isaf) in afghanistan's volatile east on monday, the coalition said in a statement, one of the worst attacks on foreign troops in recent weeks.
